name: Air Marty
description:
Join Marty and his family on the vacation of a life time!

-A multitude of minigames that all lead to a new branch in the story.
-64 endings all with a variety of hand crafted art styles.
-A roller coaster of emotions!
-Exciting "Streamlined" gameplay with each story branch lasting only minutes makes everyone a speedrunner here!
-A cast of whacky characters at every twist and turn!
